name: Depths of Luminescene
description:
Collect Light Orbs to fill up your light meter. Explore the depths to navigate your way to the end, but make sure you've gathered enough light, the deeper you go, the less food you have!

*PLEASE NOTE* We  did not get the intended version up in time. The last commits were not built and uploaded by the deadline. We will update it after the Jam to be played as it was intended.

Controls

WASD to Move

SHIFT to Sprint - Sprinting uses up your Light Orbs

ESC to Pause

There also full controller support!
